Class ec.meta.BadInvokeException 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.Throwable
           |
           +----java.lang.Exception
                   |
                   +----ec.meta.BadInvokeException
public class BadInvokeException
extends Exception
This exception is thrown when there is a problem with the parameters passed in to a call to invoke(). It wraps an exception representing the particular problem, akin to InvocationTargetException.

BadInvokeException(Throwable)
Construct a BadInvokeException.

getException()
Get the wrapped exception.

BadInvokeException 
 public BadInvokeException(Throwable t)
Construct a BadInvokeException.

Parameters:
t - the wrapped exception

getException 
 public Throwable getException()
Get the wrapped exception.

Returns:
the wrapped exception
